plot: A Quebecois Elvis impersonator is disillusioned to find a Chinaman participating in an Elvis contest. He later takes his wife on vacation to the island of Santa Banana.
title: Elvis Gratton: Le king des kings
plot_es: A Quebecois Elvis impersonator is disillusioned to find a Chinaman participating in an Elvis contest. He later takes his wife on vacation to the island of Santa Banana.
original_name: Elvis Gratton: Le king des kings
plot_en: A Quebecois Elvis impersonator is disillusioned to find a Chinaman participating in an Elvis contest. He later takes his wife on vacation to the island of Santa Banana.

cast.role: Le photographe, le preacher, l'homme du canot
cast.name: Pierre Falardeau

cast.role: Général Augusto Ricochet, Général de la RCMP
cast.name: Reynald Fortin
